titles.title: A resolution concurring in the Senate amendment to H.R. 3097 with an amendment.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 3097 (organ transplants), with the Senate amendment thereto, and concurring in the Senate amendment with an amendment.
